name: Philippine Seven Corporation
description: The largest convenience store chain in the Philippines.

name: Cargo Data Exchange Center, Inc.
description: Innovates and explores information technology to capture and maintain the e-business market in the Philippines and to provide new services in the e-Commerce sector.

name: First MFI Network
description: It aims to create systems and tools to make microfinance processes more efficient and convenient through the use of social networks, the Internet, retail outlets, electronic wallets, and mobile technology.

name: Pipol Konek
description: The Philippine government has an ambitious program to provide free public Wi-Fi to all citizens in all public places in the country underpinned by legislation that passed in 2017 that mandates the governments Department of Information and Communications (DICT) to implement the Free Public Internet Access Program.
